data.name: Crafting Robots lvl1
data.description:
You are collecting robots.
You want to craft a brand new robot from those you already own.

Write a function that verify if the new robot  can be build from your older robots.
Return True if you have the proper pieces or False is you do not have needed parts. 

All robots pieces are given in lists, which can be 1 level nested 

EXAMPLE:
```Python
your robots:
robot1 = [["battery"], ["broom"], ["processor"], ["wheel", "wheel", "wheel"]]

robot2 = [["speaker"],["wheel","wheel","wheel","wheel",], ["battery"], \
          ["battery"], ["processor"], ["console", "adapter", "cable"]]

case 1:   
new_robot1 = [["wheel", "wheel"], ["wheel", "wheel"], ["battery"]]  ---->  TRUE 
case 2:   
new_robot2 = [["leg", "leg"], ["adapter"], ["cable"], ]  ----> FALSE
```
